__e: After you've been changed, there's one thing you'll want more... One thing you'll kill for... Blood.

- Better be, or you kill my patient.
You'll kill this one, too before she tells us who has it now.
So, what's it gonna be... sweetheart? You gonna kill me too?
If you want to die today that is fine, but you are not going to kill me.
I know you didn't kill anybody.
I don't think you can kill anybody for a couple of years yet.
I know he deserves to die, but... You're not going to kill anybody.
If you don't stop the car, you'll get us both killed.
It's foolish. You'll kill us all.
How do we know you won't kill us all anyway?
How do I know you won't kill him?
Now that we've both seen your face, you're gonna kill us anyway.
